title: 1.9怎么让自定义刷怪笼在固定的位置刷出生物
author: mineconan
txt_content:
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ mob_spawner 0 replace 
{
SpawnCount:1,
SpawnRange:5,
MaxNearbyEntities:3,
RequiredPlayerRange:20,
Delay:100,
MinSpawnDelay:600,
MaxSpawnDelay:600,
SpawnData:{
id:PigZombie,
Pos:[59,37,-49],
Anger:700,
ArmorItems:
[
0:{id:golden_boots,Count:1b,tag:{ench:[{id:0,lvl:2}]}},
1:{id:leather_leggings,Count:1b,tag:{ench:[{id:0,lvl:2},{id:7,lvl:1}],display:{color:16351261}}},
2:{id:leather_chestplate,Count:1b,tag:{ench:[{id:0,lvl:2}],display:3:{color:11546150}}},
3:{id:iron_helmet,Count:1b,tag:{ench:[{id:0,lvl:2}]}}
],
HandItems:[
0:{id:golden_sword,Count:1b,tag:{ench:[{id:16,lvl:2},{id:20,lv:1}]}},
1:{}
],
HandDropChances:[0f,0f],
ArmorDropChances:[0f,0f,0f,0f]
}
}复制代码不知为何Pos标签加了没用

replies.author: 轩辕丶孟
replies.txt_content:
Pos标签要求是三个带点数，改成
Pos:[59.5,37.0,-49.5]
就可以了
